text: Koran nisposlan tebe (o Mukhammad!), chtoby uveshchevat' im otvergnuvshikh yego i zastavit' ikh uverovat', napominat' veruyushchim o nastavleniyakh Allakha i o Sudnom dne dlya ukrepleniya ikh very v istinu. Pust' ne trevozhitsya tvoyo serdtse, kogda ty peredayosh' Nashe Pisaniye iz-za togo, chto nevernyye budut yego otritsat'
